subject: Economy
A_en: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders.
A_hi: ग्रॉस विविधित आय (GDP) यूरोबीसी में एक देश के भविष्य में निर्माण की विधित आय (GDP) किसे समझने के लिए
B_en: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) represents the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders.
B_hi: ग्रॉस विविधित आय (GDP) देश के भविष्य में निर्माण के लिए
C_en: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is calculated by summing up the prices of all goods and services produced within a country.
C_hi: ग्रॉस विविधित आय (GDP) योग्यता देश के भविष्य में समझाया जाता है
D_en: GDP (Gross Domestic Product) is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country.
D_hi: ग्रॉस विविधित आय (GDP) देश के भविष्य में समझाया जाता है
E_en: GDP (Gross Domestic Product) is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country, excluding services like education and healthcare.
E_hi: ग्रॉस विविधित आय (GDP) देश के भविष्य में समझाया जाता है, जबतकि सभागी और स्वास्थली में कोण्याची उपयोगी निकीयां परिचयां
question_en: What is the primary driver of economic growth?
question_hi: एकांत्र विशास्त्रांची यां क्या संकेत उच्यां विभागी परिचेयां?
answer: विभागी विशास्त्रांची यां क्यां संकेत उच्यां परिचेयां?
A_en: The primary sectors that drive economic growth are industries, agriculture, and services.
B_en: Industries, agriculture, and services are the main sectors that contribute to economic growth.
C_en: What is the formula to calculate GDP (Gross Domestic Product)?
D_en: GDP is calculated as the sum of all goods and services produced in a country.
E_en: What are the three pillars of economy?
F_en: Three main sectors of the economy are agriculture, industry, and services.
G_en: What is the formula to calculate inflation?
H_en: Inflation is measured by comparing the prices of goods and services in a specific period.
I_en: What are the factors affecting inflation?
J_en: What is the formula to calculate the price level of goods and services?
K_en: Mention the formula to determine the GDP (Gross Domestic Product)?
L_en: What are the three main sectors of economy?
